Name: Pandora : Wild Origins
About the game: Immerse yourself in the heart of a feline's life and discover this new animal world ! Write your own story - Immerse yourself in the heart of animal life and play as a feline. Born into a protective family, you will take your first steps there before discovering new horizons and adventures filled with surprises. Discover a new world - This land is the home of the last resources, adapt yourself to this environment to increase your chances of survival. Evolve with scarce resources - Hunt and get skill points to get stronger. Become the strongest predator or the most agile as you please. Meet your soul mate - During your explorations, you will have the chance to meet felines of your species, try your talents of seduction to find your ideal partner. Start a family - Once you have found your soul mate, start a family and raise your little ones with it. Protect them from danger and starvation. Hunt 7 creatures that have been discovered on this earth: Boars , Slow But Reckless, Rabbits , Fragile But Fast, Fawns , still babies, it make them a very easy prey, Fallow deer , more robust and swift, Deer , prey of choice but very difficult to catch, Bears , very dreadful, it's better not to approach them before being strong enough, Other felines , like you, among which you will choose your partner. It's in the south of the island of Pandora that you are born into a loving family, but whose territory is not very prosperous. After taking your first steps, you will discover this mysterious place where there is no trace of human presence. You will notice that the fauna has adapted to this limited environment in order to survive and share the last resources of this land. Despite these difficult conditions, you will try to build your life and write your own story.
